events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product isn’t what I purchased.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the order.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify the details quickly?
Sure, I’ve attached a photo of the wrong product and here is my order number: 123456789. Please process the refund as soon as possible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund right away and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help! I appreciate you sorting this out promptly.
The refund request has been processed and your case is now resolved. Please reach out if you have further questions.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed after confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
